html:
12.25.21  6:33 pm   before you read this question what were u thinking about

      the previous question

12.25.21  4:05 pm   Thoughts on leadership?

      not as easy as it looks

12.25.21  3:02 pm   hi
how do you write melodies? (I can't, and if I do make one I soon realise that it was just someone else's song I kept in my memory)

      try to make it bad on purpose. the music will rebel against this, and unique things may happen

12.25.21  1:43 pm   is the hotel in "outside" the same hotel that's in "money"

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes. update, i thought about it more and it is not. the reasons i know this is because in outside it says "i just opened up a new hotel" which implies the person is the owner. in the "money" song it says "at the hotel where i'm staying" and i just don't see the person as being the hotel owner in that case

12.25.21  11:14 am   will you ever make a christmas song?

      i've done it before, and i'll do it again

12.25.21  3:48 am   what is the meaning of christmas

      darkness, while being very grateful and thankful that the world is not usually this dark. in the southern hemisphere it takes a bit of reverse psychology to get this

12.25.21  12:43 am   will dan smith teach you guitar?

      no way

12.25.21  12:27 am   ever write down your dreams on the notebook page?

      i don't write anything in the notebook sections, i just upload things i've written offline previously. i write down dreams sometimes but i can't remember if any of them have been uploaded to that section. if they are, it would say clearly that that's what it is

12.24.21  9:32 pm   Do you worry about not having friends and how it may negatively affect you?

      sometimes

12.24.21  9:07 pm   I tried transcribing "history of the entire world, i guess" once, and the beginning at least lines up well at 135 bpm. This would make the pause near the start 42 8th notes long. Was it composed to a grid,

     absolutely not

     and is that an intentional Douglas Adams reference? 

      absolutely not

12.24.21  8:44 pm   Hi bill, I've been a huge fan of your music in 2021. I've got two random questions for you:
1. Are you autistic?

     i don't know

     2. Do any of your songs have secret meanings?

      that depends what meanings you have found so far

12.24.21  7:59 pm   why is the earth round

     to blow your mind

      and why do people want to take over the world 

      for college credit maybe

12.24.21  7:52 pm   Why are notes "sharp" or "flat" instead of "sharp" or "smooth", or "flat" or "round"

      why would it be those other ways instead of the first way

12.24.21  5:58 pm   what should I do for christmas?

      everything

12.24.21  1:07 pm   are you going to make a Christmas song/video for youtube

      i've done that a couple of times and i will probably do it again

12.24.21  8:12 am   how does one talk to people without getting that weird feeling in the stomach?

      if you talk to people much more often it gets easier

12.24.21  5:07 am   are you a princess?

      no but i can see why you would think that

12.24.21  3:46 am   so did you ever end up eating those blades of grass?

      no

12.24.21  3:00 am   What are the 3 chords on Long long long journey when you say "Still might win"

      that's just 2 chords. Bb7 and Ebmin7

12.24.21  1:06 am   How long would a week have to be for you to confidently go on a weekly release schedule

      how about 1 day

12.24.21  12:38 am   How do you feel about multisyllable single digit numbers

      pretty good

12.23.21  11:43 pm   How can I get out of a writers block with songwriting?

      try to write the wrong song

12.23.21  11:26 pm   whats up with those easter island heads?

      a 3D printing test gone horribly wrong

12.23.21  9:41 pm   How many stings does a harp have?

      oh just a couple billion or so

12.23.21  9:29 pm   how do i do everything?

      start by making a list of everything

12.23.21  8:23 pm   hey i have something to ask where should i start trying to make music

      how about right where you are

12.23.21  8:13 pm   what's the difference between britain and the uk?

      britain is the big island with london and glasgow on it. the uk is a country which includes that island plus a piece of the ireland island and some other stuff maybe

12.23.21  7:48 pm   what's the best song you haven't written yet?

      i don't know

12.23.21  6:23 pm    Do you give a lot of thought into how your songs are structured? Or do you just do what you think sounds good?

      i put a lot of thought into what sounds good

12.23.21  6:16 pm   Thoughts on elephants?

      i always forget what size they are

12.23.21  3:09 pm   more than a dream sounds great in my monitors, but in my car it feels too heavy on the bass side, why is this

      i stopped doing car tests because it's too depressing and it makes me purge out all of the low end and makes the non-car mix too thin. the solution to this is some magic trick i have not acquired yet

12.23.21  2:08 pm   hey bill, here's a long one. a week or two ago i was drinking with some friends and i went way overboard, i was pretty much on another planet. at some point this one friend (who in the weeks leading up to this day i had talked a lot to about how friends should be able to open up to each other and all that) and i went to go do something and i guess he was drunk and comfortable enough with our friendship to tell me a deeply personal secret, one that he didn't even tell his therapist or anything. almost as soon as we returned to the rest of the group i unthinkingly blurted the secret out in front of everybody. i immediately apologized and he says that he's gotten over it and forgiven me but i've been having a real hard time trying to get over what a terrible thing i've done and what a terrible person i feel like. do you have any advice for me in this trying time?

      that's simply the power of alchohol. use it wisely

12.23.21  12:00 pm   thoughts on birds running for president?

      that's fine with me

12.23.21  11:39 am   Do you appreciate clever questions?

      i appreciate everything

12.23.21  8:03 am   Favorite word at this very moment

      moment

12.23.21  6:40 am   how do i develop a heightened sense of humour (like yours) 

      that's easy. just start taking everything extremely seriously

12.23.21  4:45 am   can i get a top view image of the streets in "got some money"

      sure

12.23.21  1:44 am   in "and the day goes on", in 1900, the times are going to change. why, and how?

      being the 3rd verse, it seems to look toward a more broader time range. thinking about time and changes over the course of 10s or even 100s of years into the future. certainly there must have already been a feeling in 1900 that times were going to change, with rapidly developing new technologies. sound recordings, video, radio, cars, many more things. it's similar to the feeling we've been having ever since, with telephones, computers, planes, ai, many more things. By placing this in 1900, it's giving you an alternate view of the same story from an earlier point in time, and it also gives you the listener the sensation of actually being in the future, as you are listening to it more than 100 years later. so it hopefully rings especially true that times did change and indeed still are

12.22.21  10:27 pm   any advice on writing raps?

      spend some of your time listening to beats while messing around saying stuff. spend another portion of your time quietly trying to imagine what you might say next time the beat is on

12.22.21  9:41 pm   Do you have any type of phobia? 

      yes

12.22.21  7:40 pm   where does the sun go after it sets?

      it stays where it is. while you're going around the world

12.22.21  5:16 pm   why don't you use capital letters?

      i do, but why don't you

12.22.21  3:21 pm   Hey bill, how to get out of my own mind a little and live the present?

      if you can get your mind into the present then you can have both

12.22.21  2:33 pm   is your next song 2:00-2:59?

      no

12.22.21  1:56 pm   why are some things bigger than others

      yes

      yes

      pretty good
